name: travelease
description: - Make sure Node is installed (https://nodejs.org/en/download/) - Make sure MySQL is installed (https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/installer/) - Make sure `config.json` is configured properly - Open Terminal in this project and run the following command for initial setup     + `npm install` - Run the following command to start the server     + `npm start`

scripts.start: cls && echo Updating NPM Packages... (Press ctrl+c to exit) && npm install && cls && echo Starting Server... (Press ctrl+c to exit) && node index.js
